scripts.dev:ai: cd ai_model && source venv/bin/activate && python3 app.py
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm --force install && npm run build
scripts.build:ai: cd ai_model && [ ! -d "venv" ] && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt || source venv/bin/activate && python3 gen_model.py
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:ai
scripts.start:ai: cd ai_model && source venv/bin/activate && gunicorn -w 4 -b 0.0.0.0:5001 app:app
